featured.text: The 1962 celebration "was more enthusiastic -- a lot more people," said one spectator, who as a young newlywed attended Glenn’s first parade and came from her Brooklyn home again for Glenn’s second parade.
The generator is now in place at the cactus market, where the vendors are enthusiastic about this new way to utilize the tons of cactus husks that once went directly into the trash.

definition.en_def: Having or showing intense and eager enjoyment, interest, or approval.
definition.example: She was enthusiastic about joining the new club.
